item.title: WiseTech 同意以 21 亿美元债务融资收购 E2open
item.description: 澳大利亚航运软件公司 WiseTech Global Ltd. 已同意收购 E2open Parent Holdings Inc.【原文：Australian shipping software company WiseTech Global Ltd. has agreed to buy E2open Parent Holdings Inc. in a deal that values the US company at $2.1 billion.】

item.title: 脱欧期限延长，美国股市期货上涨：市场综述
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）延长了对欧洲征收激进关税的最后期限后，美国股指期货在周一亚洲早盘交易中攀升。【原文：US equity-index futures climbed in early Asian trading on Monday after President Donald Trump extended a deadline on aggressive European tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普支持新日铁协议带来巨大疑问
item.description: 经过 17 个多月的游说和艰苦谈判，日本新日本制铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp.【原文：After more than 17 months of lobbying and close-fought negotiations to secure control of United States Steel Corp., Japan’s Nippon Steel Corp. appeared on Friday to have received a presidential blessing.】

item.title: 特朗普将对欧盟商品征收 50%关税的最后期限延长至 7 月 9 日
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在与欧盟委员会主席乌尔苏拉-冯德莱恩通电话后表示，他将把欧盟面临 50%关税的最后期限延长至 7 月 9 日。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would extend the deadline for the European Union to face 50% tariffs until July 9 after a phone call with Commission President Ursula von der Leyen.】

item.title: 创纪录的印度私人信贷交易取决于棘手的抵押品
item.description: 从表面上看，印度创纪录的私人信贷交易是市场的一个里程碑。【原文：On the surface, India’s record-breaking private credit deal is a milestone for the market.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 从中国到欧洲的市场上，鸡肉将更难买到，因为头号出口国巴西发现了一例禽流感病例。北半球夏季即将来临，飓风预报和美国汽油需求预测也随之而来。被称为 "钴的沙特阿拉伯 "的刚果民主共和国正在成为中美贸易战中的一员。【原文：Chicken is going to be harder to come by in markets from China to Europe after a case of bird flu was detected in top exporter Brazil. Summer is just around the corner in the Northern Hemisphere, prompting forecasts for hurricanes as well as predictions about gasoline demand in the US. And the Democratic Republic of the Congo — dubbed the “Saudi Arabia of cobalt” — is becoming a player in the trade war between China and the US.】

item.title: 国债交易员进入删节周，通胀成为首要考虑因素
item.description: 疲惫不堪的债券投资者在进入假期缩短的一周时，面临着新的美国通胀数据，而此时，由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的关税计划，消费者已经预计到了更大的价格压力。【原文：Weary bond investors enter a holiday-shortened week facing fresh US inflation readings at a time when consumers are already anticipating steeper prices pressures given President Donald Trump’s tariff plans.】

item.title: BPM 银行就意大利监管机构推迟联合信贷银行收购提出上诉
item.description: Banco BPM SpA 正在寻求阻止意大利市场监管机构推迟意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）对该银行的收购计划，这是该交易法律战不断升级的一部分。【原文：Banco BPM SpA is seeking to block Italy’s market regulator from delaying a proposed takeover of the bank by UniCredit SpA, as part of an escalating legal battle over the deal.】

item.title: 长债反弹迫使 60/40 在混乱的 2025 年市场卷土重来
item.description: 美国长期债券的低迷为经典投资策略的卷土重来蒙上了阴影。【原文：A slump in the US long bond is clouding the comeback of a classic investment strategy.】

item.title: 欧洲航运瓶颈预计将持续至七月
item.description: 一份新的报告显示，北欧和其他枢纽的主要门户港口拥堵情况正在恶化，报告还指出，贸易战可能会将海运干扰蔓延到亚洲和美国，并推高运费。【原文：Port congestion is worsening at key gateways in northern Europe and other hubs, according to a new report which suggests trade wars could spread maritime disruptions to Asia and the US and push up shipping rates.】

item.title: 新兴市场动态：乌克兰债券交易失去动力（播客）
item.description: Andras Gergely 与宋子嘉探讨了今年早些时候最热门的新兴市场交易之一是如何随着乌克兰迅速达成和平协议的希望破灭而失去动力的。【原文：Andras Gergely talks with Zijia Song about how one of the hottest emerging markets trades from earlier this year is now losing steam, as the hopes for a rapid Ukraine peace deal dim.】

item.title: 乌克兰债券受和平影响而邻国市场大涨
item.description: 围绕唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫最受欢迎的新兴市场交易之一正步履蹒跚。【原文：One of the most popular emerging-market trades around Donald Trump’s return to the White House is stumbling.】

item.title: 乔尼-艾维（Jony Ive）与 OpenAI 的交易给苹果带来了寻找下一个 "大事件 "的压力
item.description: 乔尼-艾维（Jony Ive）与 OpenAI 的交易应该会在苹果公司引起巨大震动，尤其是在设计团队人才流失、人工智能领域举步维艰之后。还有苹果计划明年年底推出类似 Meta 的智能眼镜，特朗普威胁对智能手机征收 25% 的关税。展望 WWDC，我们有关于该公司操作系统重新设计计划的最新细节，以及可能是其最大的人工智能公告。【原文：Jony Ive’s deal with OpenAI should cause major shockwaves at Apple, especially after a design-team brain drain and struggles in artificial intelligence. Also: Apple plans Meta-like smart glasses for late next year, and Trump threatens a 25% smartphone tariff. Looking ahead to WWDC, we have the latest details on the company’s operating system redesign plan and what’s likely to be its biggest AI announcement.】

item.title: 法拉奇施压，雷纳为福利改革留有余地
item.description: 英国副首相安吉拉-雷纳（Angela Rayner）对政府是否会取消二孩福利上限持开放态度，而奈杰尔-法拉奇（Nigel Farage）领导的英国改革党（Reform UK）正力图在降低生活成本方面超越执政党工党。【原文：UK Deputy Prime Minister Angela Rayner left the door open on whether the government will lift the two-child benefit cap even as Nigel Farage’s Reform UK seeks to outflank the ruling Labour Party in bringing down the cost of living.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦为比特币矿业分配 2,000 兆瓦发电能力
item.description: 在巴基斯坦推动加密货币合法化和吸引外国投资的过程中，该国在支持比特币挖矿和人工智能数据中心的第一阶段分配了 2000 兆瓦的电力。【原文：Pakistan has allocated 2,000 megawatts of electricity in the first phase of a national push to support Bitcoin mining and AI data centers, as the country moves to legalize cryptocurrency and attract foreign investments.】

item.title: 中国与印尼主权财富基金加强投资关系
item.description: 在李强总理访问雅加达期间，中国和印尼同意加强两国经济之间的联系，其中包括涉及两国主权财富基金投资的联系。【原文：China and Indonesia agreed to step up ties between their economies during Premier Li Qiang’s visit to Jakarta, including one on investment involving their sovereign wealth funds.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称加拿大 CDPQ 公司将在英国投资 100 多亿美元
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》报道，加拿大养老基金魁北克储蓄与投资局（Caisse de Depot et Placement du Quebec）正考虑在未来五年内在英国投资超过 80 亿英镑（108 亿美元）。【原文：Canadian pension fund Caisse de Depot et Placement du Quebec is looking at investing more than £8 billion ($10.8 billion) in the UK over the coming five years, the Financial Times reported.】

item.title: 软银之子提出美日主权财富基金构想：金融时报
item.description: 英国《金融时报》援引三位不愿透露姓名的知情人士的话报道称，软银创始人孙正义提议成立一个美日主权财富基金，旨在对技术和基础设施进行大规模投资。【原文：SoftBank founder Masayoshi Son has proposed setting up a US-Japan sovereign wealth fund aimed at making large investments in technology and infrastructure, the Financial Times reported, citing three unidentified people close to the situation.】

item.title: 澳大利亚东海岸开始清理洪水，水位逐渐回升
item.description: 在东部新南威尔士州发生毁灭性洪灾后，澳大利亚已从全国各地征召应急服务队，帮助开展清理行动。【原文：Australia has drafted in emergency service teams from across the nation to help with clean-up operations after devastating floods in the eastern state of New South Wales.】

item.title: 布林神秘捐赠 7 亿美元股票给慈善机构
item.description: 据谢尔盖-布林家族办公室的一位发言人称，他本周神秘赠送的价值近 7 亿美元的 Alphabet 公司股票被捐赠给了三家慈善组织。【原文：Sergey Brin’s mystery gift this week of Alphabet Inc. shares valued at almost $700 million went to a trio of philanthropic organizations, according to a spokesperson for his family office.】

item.title: 美联储大步迈向通胀温和的下一个月
item.description: 美联储可能会对关税尚未实质性地推动官方通胀读数感到欣慰，但政策制定者将继续暗示暂不加息，直到他们更好地了解美国贸易政策的未来影响。【原文：The Federal Reserve may take comfort that tariffs have yet to materially boost official inflation readings, but policymakers will continue to suggest interest rates are on hold until they better understand the coming impact of US trade policy.】

item.title: 最垃圾的垃圾是债务的警告信号
item.description: 在今年的大部分时间里，基金经理们都抱着乐观的态度抢购公司债券，使估值达到了越来越昂贵的水平。现在，华尔街巨头们说，是时候关注事情会变得多么糟糕了。【原文：For much of the year, money managers have embraced optimism and snatched up corporate bonds, sending valuations to ever more expensive levels. Now, Wall Street titans are saying it’s time to focus on how bad things can get.】

item.title: 马斯克誓言在 X 故障中 "超级关注 "企业
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）说，他需要 "超级专注 "于他的公司，并指出 X 公司的问题证明了社交网络需要 "重大 "改进。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk said he needs to be “super focused” on his companies, pointing to issues at X as evidence of a need for “major” improvement at the social network.】

item.title: 成千上万人报告社交媒体平台出现问题，X 下降
item.description: 由于用户报告网站出现问题，社交媒体平台 X（前身为 Twitter）在周六出现故障。【原文：The social media platform X, formerly known as Twitter, experienced an outage on Saturday as users reported issues with the site.】

item.title: 意大利铁路公司称或将测试马斯克的 "星链 "项目
item.description: 意大利国有铁路运营商意大利国家铁路公司（Ferrovie dello Stato Italiane SpA）表示，它可能会在未来的项目中测试埃隆-马斯克的 "星际链路"（Starlink）。【原文：Italian state-owned rail operator Ferrovie dello Stato Italiane SpA said it might test Elon Musk’s Starlink for future projects.】

item.title: 购买美国货欧洲必须如何为乌克兰储备武器
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）似乎要退出乌克兰战争之际，欧洲领导人正在争分夺秒地研究如何继续向乌克兰提供武器。选择之一：购买美国货。【原文：European leaders are racing to figure out how to keep Ukraine supplied with weapons as US President Donald Trump appears to be walking away from the war. One option: buy American.】

item.title: 路透社称英伟达计划为中国市场提供更便宜的 Blackwell AI 芯片
item.description: 据路透社周六援引熟悉内情但未透露身份的人士的话报道，英伟达公司计划面向中国市场推出一款采用最新Blackwell架构的新型人工智能芯片，价格将低于H20型号。【原文：Nvidia Corp. plans to launch a new artificial intelligence chip for China with its latest Blackwell architecture at a lower price than the H20 model, Reuters reported on Saturday, citing people familiar with the matter who weren’t identified.】

item.title: 肯-罗格夫谈加密货币如何渗透美元霸权
item.description: 从国际货币基金组织到美联储，肯尼斯-罗格夫多年来一直在帮助塑造美元主导的全球经济秩序的机构内部工作。【原文：From the International Monetary Fund to the Federal Reserve, Kenneth Rogoff has spent years inside the institutions that helped shape the dollar-led global economic order.】

item.title: 民调显示：特朗普的关税政策可能引发美国消费者不满
item.description:
唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易议程让消费者对家庭成本忧心忡忡。【原文：

President Donald Trump’s trade agenda is leaving consumers worried about their household costs. 

】

item.title: 孟加拉国临时政府表示将坚持到底
item.description: 一位内阁高层成员表示，孟加拉国临时政府无意在完成其职责之前下台，并驳斥了有关其领导人穆罕默德-尤努斯可能辞职的猜测。【原文：Bangladesh’s interim government has no intention of stepping down before completing its responsibilities, a top cabinet member said, rejecting speculation over a possible resignation of its leader Muhammad Yunus.】
